title: How does one get so highly educated but not know what the term coyote is when used as a smuggler? Is this willful ignorance? - Quora

response.answer_text: You don’t know what you don’t know. There’s a lot of various words that aren’t used day to day in life these days. I personally didn’t know that ‘coyote’ is used to describe a smuggler. It’s not willful ignorance. It’s lack of exposure, that’s all.
Its not the kind of term a well educated person would ever need to use or know about, Im sure there are a lot of slang terms used in the drug trade (mule, narc) etc that people dont know about.
